title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.11 - Appropriate certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.11 - Appropriate certification

State Regulations

Nothing herein contained shall be construed to authorize or
require a board of education or board of cooperative educational services to
place or retain an individual in a position for which such individual does not
possess appropriate certification in accordance with the provisions of Part 80
of the Regulations of the Commissioner of Education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-1.11

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
